product_name: The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip Top - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip top for women provides ultrasoft warmth and breathability without a lot of weight and bulk. Wear it for hiking, climbing or running around town in cool weather.
